abstract: Tushar Morzaria, the chief financial officer of corporate and investment banking at JPMorgan Chase, will join Barclays in the autumn.
snippet: Tushar Morzaria, the chief financial officer of corporate and investment banking at JPMorgan Chase, will join Barclays in the autumn.
lead_paragraph: LONDON – Barclays said on Tuesday that it had named Tushar Morzaria, a JPMorgan Chase executive, as chief financial officer. He succeeds Christopher G. Lucas, who announced his plan to retire earlier this year.

headline.main: Barclays Hires a JPMorgan Executive as Its Next C.F.O.

abstract: In the last few days, the three big American bond-trading firms – JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup and Goldman Sachs – all reported second-quarter financial results that were helped by healthy bond trading revenue.
snippet: In the last few days, the three big American bond-trading firms – JPMorgan Chase, Citigroup and Goldman Sachs – all reported second-quarter financial results that were helped by healthy bond trading revenue.
lead_paragraph: There may be less reason to fear the big, bad bond market.

headline.main: Despite Fears, Bond Market Is Functioning Fine
